title: "AI can search satellite data to find plastic floating in the sea"
excerpt: "The technique may eventually help environmental researchers better monitor and manage plastic waste in the ocean. Lauren Biermann at the Plymouth Marine Laboratory in the UK, and her colleagues have devised an AI capable of identifying sea plastic in imagery taken at varying wavelengths of light.
